channel.title: Notes on Notes to self

item.title: Books
item.description: A personal summary of books I have ready and/or am reading. I started doing this in the beginning of 2024. I may later add some books that I read prior. How to Live on Twenty-Four Hours a Day Author: Arnold Bennett Reviewed on: 07 September 2024 This one is more of my book reading notes than a review. I hope these notes will rouse enough curiosity in you to actually go read the book.
